title: The Spiritual Attainment of Minghe - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Antihero Protagonist   Army Building   Artifact Crafting   Artifacts   Beasts   Blood Manipulation   Bloodlines   Body Tempering   Buddhism   Clones   Crafting   Cultivation   Dao Comprehension   Demons   Determined Protagonist   Dragons   Enlightenment   Evil Gods   Fast Cultivation   Gods   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heavenly Tribulation   Immortals   Inheritance   Loyal Subordinates   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Mythical Beasts   Mythology   Pill Concocting   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in Another World   Schemes And Conspiracies   Spear Wielder   Strong to Stronger   Time Skip   Wars   World Travel
author: God Loves The World   神仙爱凡尘
description: The Spiritual Attainment of Minghe is a Chinese fantasy fiction containing themes of cultivation, Sages, Demons, Sorcerers, and Chinese Ancestors. Minghe, reincarnated from an IT nerd in the modern world, sets his mind to change his history and create another legend in the Untainted Land. No one knows how many secrets he has or how powerful he is. What will happen in this afterlife of his? How can he pursue the power of the Origin in order to change his history? Discover all the answers in this book.>
